name: Mohammed Iyad
title: UI/UX Designer
about: UI/UX Designer with a passion for clean, intuitive interfaces.
Expert in Figma and responsive web design principles.
Designs seamless flows for HubZero's web and mobile experiences.

projects.name: HubZero Website Redesign
projects.desc: Modernized HubZero's design with a new style guide and UI library.
projects.longDesc: Led the redesign initiative for HubZero's entire web experience, including a new design system, responsive breakpoints, and component consistency.
